page.title: 10Shopping in Ingleton
page.content: There are two bakeries in Ingleton there is one near the village centre and there is one in the middle of the village. They sell bread and Cornish pasties. A Cornish pastie has pastry round the outside the filling is mashed up patato, sliced carrots and mincemeat.They also sell sausage rolls which are made out of crumbly pastry with a sausage in the middle. They sell cream buns and lots of other cakes.In the other bakery they sell more or less the same things but they sell crisps and drinks.There are three general stores, they sell all the things you want but sometimes they run out of things or they become too dear so you have to travel all the way to Lancaster or Morecambe.The general stores all sell cigarettes,cigars and matches.
